Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives. But he had no regrets about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan-- the latter now nearing its 10th anniversary. He refused to echo the regrets of another domineering defense secretary--

even the slightest hint of that,'' he said. On the weapons of mass destruction that never surfaced despite being cited by the President Bush administration as the primary justification for the war, Donald Rumsfeld acknowledged: My goodness, the intelligence was certainly wrong. The decision was made over the holidays 2010. For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Google co-founder Larry Page will lead product development and technology strategy, and starting from 4 April 2010 he will take charge of day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. Satya Nadella previously worked in Microsoft Business Solutions on Dynamics, the company's customer relationship management software. In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways, Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to all employees. Sergio Marchionne , the chief executive of both Chrysler and Fiat, said that retooling the product lineup had positioned Chrysler to start making money again. It can be safely said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, He said the company would increase revenues this year to$ 55 billion and achieve net income of$ 200 million to$ 500 million.
